mapper.sql: userID, username, password, phone, registerDate, status, mID
mapper.insert: insert into user (userID, username, password, phone, registerDate, status, mID) values (#{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mID,jdbcType=INTEGER})

userID,
